titles.title: My heart is fixed, eternal God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: My heart is fixed, eternal God, Fixed on Thee, fixed on Thee; And my immortal choice is made, Christ for me, Christ for me; He is my prophet, priest, and king, Who did for me salvation bring, And while I’ve breath I mean to sing, Christ for me, Christ for me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: In Him I see the Godhead shine, Christ for me, Christ for me; He is the majesty divine, Christ for me, Christ for me; The Father’s well-beloved Son, Co-partner of His royal throne, Who bore the guilt of man alone, Christ for me, Christ for me.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: In pining sickness, or in health, Christ for me, Christ for me; In deepest poverty or wealth, Christ for me, Christ for me; And in that all-important day, When I the summons must obey, And pass from this dark world away, Christ for me, Christ for me.
